card.text: Whenever Stromgald Spy attacks and isn't blocked, you may have defending player play with his or her hand revealed for as long as Stromgald Spy remains on the battlefield. If you do, Stromgald Spy assigns no combat damage this turn.

card.name: Suffocation
card.text: Cast Suffocation only if you were dealt damage this turn by a red instant or sorcery spell. Suffocation deals 4 damage to the controller of the last red instant or sorcery spell that dealt damage to you this turn. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

card.name: Surge of Strength
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Surge of Strength, discard a red or green card. Target creature gains trample and gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is that creature's converted mana cost.

card.name: Sustaining Spirit
card.text: Cumulative upkeep {1}{W} Damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 reduces it to 1 instead.

card.name: Swamp Mosquito
card.text: Flying Whenever Swamp Mosquito attacks and isn't blocked, defending player gets a poison counter.

card.text: Flying Whenever Swamp Mosquito attacks and isn't blocked, defending player gets a poison counter.

card.name: Sworn Defender
card.text: {1}: Sworn Defender's power becomes the toughness of target creature blocking or being blocked by Sworn Defender minus 1 until end of turn, and Sworn Defender's toughness becomes 1 plus the power of that creature until end of turn.

card.name: Taste of Paradise
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Taste of Paradise, you may pay {1}{G} any number of times. You gain 3 life plus an additional 3 life for each additional {1}{G} you paid.

card.name: Taste of Paradise
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Taste of Paradise, you may pay {1}{G} any number of times. You gain 3 life plus an additional 3 life for each additional {1}{G} you paid.

card.name: Thawing Glaciers
card.text: Thawing Glaciers enters the battlefield tapped. {1}, {T}: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library. Return Thawing Glaciers to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next cleanup step.

card.name: Thought Lash
card.text: Cumulative upkeep - Exile the top card of your library. When a player doesn't pay Thought Lash's cumulative upkeep, that player exiles all cards from his or her library. Exile the top card of your library: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to you this turn.

card.name: Tidal Control
card.text: Cumulative upkeep {2} Pay 2 life or {2}: Counter target red or green spell. Any player may activate this ability.

card.name: Tornado
card.text: Cumulative upkeep {G} {2}{G}, Pay 3 life for each velocity counter on Tornado: Destroy target permanent and put a velocity counter on Tornado. Activate this ability only once each turn.

card.name: Undergrowth
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Undergrowth, you may pay {2}{R}. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn. If its additional cost was paid, Undergrowth doesn't affect combat damage that would be dealt by red creatures.

card.name: Undergrowth
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Undergrowth, you may pay {2}{R}. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn. If its additional cost was paid, Undergrowth doesn't affect combat damage that would be dealt by red creatures.

card.name: Urza's Engine
card.text: Trample {3}: Urza's Engine gains banding until end of turn. {3}: Attacking creatures banded with Urza's Engine gain trample until end of turn.

card.text: {T}, Sacrifice a creature and a Swamp: Destroy target nonartifact creature. It can't be regenerated. {T}, Sacrifice a creature and a snow Swamp: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Wandering Mage
card.text: {W}, Pay 1 life: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn. {U}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target Cleric or Wizard creature this turn. {B}, Put a -1/-1 counter on a creature you control: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target player this turn.

card.name: Whip Vine
card.text: Defender; reach You may choose not to untap Whip Vine during your untap step. {T}: Tap target creature with flying blocked by Whip Vine. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as Whip Vine remains tapped.
